text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: C O M P L E T E   M A S T E R Y ! !
Amazement! Even that legendary Trainer of old never achieved a perfect sweep of all G1 victories!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Bravo! You are a being who will be celebrated in the Academy from now on!—A Legend of Tracen Academy!!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: ...And now, tears of joy! I send my highest praise to the miracle of the bond created by you and the Umamusume—
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Thank you, truly... for making my dream come true...!!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Now, let us brand the shimmer of those seamlessly displayed prize cups into our eyes—!!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
